meanings.definition: A person or organization that establishes something.
meanings.sent1: The establisher of the new school worked hard to create a welcoming environment for students.
meanings.sent2: The establisher of the company had a clear vision for its growth and success.
meanings.sent3: The establisher of the club accidentally set up a meeting on a holiday, causing a funny mix-up.
meanings.sent4: As an establisher of traditions, she planted the seeds of unity in the community.
meanings.sent5: The establisher's dedication to quality made the business stand out among competitors.

meanings.definition: One who sets up or founds something.
meanings.sent1: The establisher of the charity organization helped many people in need.
meanings.sent2: The establisher of the museum carefully selected artifacts for display.
meanings.sent3: The establisher of the lemonade stand had a sour start but soon turned things around.
meanings.sent4: Like an establisher of dreams, he built a bridge between imagination and reality.
meanings.sent5: The establisher's passion ignited a spark of creativity in the community.
